Package FluxBus.entities

Class Busride

  • java.lang.Object
    • FluxBus.entities.Busride
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Busride>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Charter, StandardRide
    public abstract class Busride
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Busride>
    A bus ride in the fix bus management system (FluxBus).

    A bus ride stores information about place and time of departure and arrival as well as the bus and the driver. Both driver and passengers can be added to a bus ride.

    Bus rides are naturally ordered by ID.

      the passengers added (listed) to this bus ride.
      private java.lang.String rideID
      the id of this bus ride.
      private Bus vehicle
      the bus assigned to this bus ride, if any.

    • Field Detail

      • rideID

        private java.lang.String rideID
        the id of this bus ride. example: RT55X. must be non-null and non-empty.

      • origin

        private java.lang.String origin
        the origin of this bus ride. example: Budapest. must be non-null and non-empty.

      • destination

        private java.lang.String destination
        the destination of this bus ride. example: Vienna. must be non-null and non-empty.

      • departure

        private DateTime departure
        the scheduled departure of this bus ride in UTC.

      • arrival

        private DateTime arrival
        the scheduled arrival of this bus ride in UTC.

      • vehicle

        private Bus vehicle
        the bus assigned to this bus ride, if any. when no bus has been assigned yet this is null.

      • driver

        private Person driver
        the driver of this bus ride.

      • passengers

        private java.util.Set<Person> passengers
        the passengers added (listed) to this bus ride.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Busride

        public Busride​(java.lang.String rideID,
               java.lang.String origin,
               java.lang.String destination,
               DateTime departure,
               DateTime arrival)
        Creates a bus ride with an id, an origin, a destination and both departure and arrival.

        Calls the final setters.

        Parameters:
        rideID - the id of this bus ride
        origin - the origin of this bus ride
        destination - the destination of this bus ride
        departure - the scheduled departure date and time of this bus ride
        arrival - the scheduled arrival date and time of this bus ride

      • Busride

        public Busride​(Busride orig)
        bus ride as a deep copy of some original bus ride.

        All attached objects are duplicated. Both driver and passenger objects are also duplicated.

        Parameters:
        orig - the original bus ride to be copied.

      • setDeparture

        public final void setDeparture​(DateTime departure)
        Sets the scheduled date and time of departure of this bus ride.

        This is a defensive setter, i.e. it creates a private copy of the argument.

        Parameters:
        departure - the scheduled date and time of departure to set

      • setVehicle

        public Busride setVehicle​(Bus vehicle)
        Sets the vehicle of this bus ride and returns this busride for method chaining.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this bus ride

      • setDriver

        public void setDriver​(Person driver)
        Adds a driver to this bus ride. Null values are ignored and the field stays unchanged.
        Parameters:
        driver - the driver to be added.

      • add

        public boolean add​(Person passenger)
        Adds a passenger to this bus ride.

        Passengers can only be added once to this bus ride. Passengers are added if the assigned vehicle has sufficient capacity or is unknown (null). Null passengers are rejected.

        Parameters:
        passenger - the passenger to be added
        Returns:
        whether the new passenger was successfully added.

      • getRideID

        public java.lang.String getRideID()
        Gets the ride id of this bus ride.
        Returns:
        the bus ride id

      • getArrival

        public DateTime getArrival()
        Gets the scheduled date and time of arrival of this bus ride.

        This is a defensive getter, i.e. it returns a copy of the current DateTime object.

        Returns:
        a copy of the current DateTime object

      • getOrigin

        public java.lang.String getOrigin()
        Gets the origin of this bus ride.
        Returns:
        the origin.
